About

Emoji-compressor is an open-source library, written in Go, as a side-project. This website is just a demo for the package.

We have ported to Go some known basic encoding and compression algorithms and added the emoji twist. Some of the methods may result in smaller texts (as in the number of characters), but larger in bytes.

The authors of Emoji compressor are Adrian B.G. and @davidescus The website runs on GitHub Pages and Google Cloud.
